review.text: It's awesome.  Camera is nice and cleared. While shoot a photo at night time or low lights it's given good clarity pictures. I felt Less heating during charge my mobile. Then while playing heavy processing games gets heated. Otherwise the phone is best one to choose this price.

I have replaced two chargers. First one blew away just few days after 6 months warranty was over. Now again suddenly the phone is dead. Don't know if charger is dead again or this time the phone is gone.....bad experience.

Ear piece volume is very low after upgrading and it's very frustrating to use this phone without a earphone.

Have been chasing the customer care but it's not much of use as of now I plan to walk to their center in Bangalore now.

Love the camera and the body. The sleek design and the awesome RAM does not let you down ever. As one makes use of it on a daily level then the battery standby time decreases. It begins by giving a backup of 12-13 hours a day and then reduces to 9-10 hours over a period of an year
review.Expected categories: camera, Design, Processor, Battery, over all performance

review.text: Phone is very fast,sleek in design with latest hardware, but you will miss many features of other brands
Phone is good but as committed battery is very poor. Discharges 100% within 7-8 hours of use. Data corrupts automatically sometimes. I faced the same two times.
Not at all suitable size is a few mm big gets lifted by the mobile cover

review.text: Great phone for the given price, charges very quickly thanks to dash charging, camera quality is really good and overall performance is blazing fast
Brilliant phone. Stunning design. Good battery back up. Super fast. Worth buying. Just not too happy wid protruding camera lens.
